description: Design tokens in W3C DTCG format, organized by category

colors.description: Color palette tokens (primitive, semantic, dark mode) — each leaf has $value (hex) and $type: color

spacing.description: Spacing scale tokens (0–96) — each has $value (rem/px) and $type: dimension

typography.description: Typography tokens: family ($type: fontFamily), size ($type: dimension), weight ($type: fontWeight), lineHeight ($type: number), letterSpacing ($type: dimension)

shadows.description: Box shadow tokens (none–2xl, inner) — $type: shadow, $value is object or array of {offsetX, offsetY, blur, spread, color}

animation.description: Animation tokens: duration ($type: duration, ms) and easing ($type: cubicBezier, [x1,y1,x2,y2])
